content_analysis.reasoning: This content covers foundational geometry, five specific shape sequences, and general skills for recognition, extension, and rule description. With 2 simple concepts (1 game each), 3 medium (2 games each), and 2 complex (3 games each), the total aligns to 10 games for progressive mastery without gaps or overload, ensuring complete coverage through unique, building experiences.

generated_games.title: Shape Basics Explorer
generated_games.concept: Introduction to patterns in shapes and geometry
generated_games.learning_objective: Identify basic shapes in 1D, 2D, 3D and recognize geometry as the study of shape patterns

generated_games.title: Polygon Pattern Spotter
generated_games.learning_objective: Recognize and identify polygons by increasing sides (triangle to decagon)

generated_games.title: Next Polygon Builder
generated_games.learning_objective: Draw and extend the next polygon in the sequence, understanding the rule of adding sides

generated_games.title: Graph Connection Challenge
generated_games.learning_objective: Identify complete graphs K2 to K6 and their vertex connections

generated_games.title: Connect the Dots Graph
generated_games.learning_objective: Create complete graphs by connecting all vertices and describe the pattern of edges

generated_games.title: Square Stack Puzzle
generated_games.learning_objective: Recognize growing square grids (1x1 to 5x5) as a pattern

generated_games.title: Build Bigger Squares
generated_games.learning_objective: Extend stacked squares by adding layers and explain the growth rule

generated_games.title: Triangle Stack Adventure
generated_games.learning_objective: Identify and extend triangular arrangements, understanding row-based growth

generated_games.title: Snowflake Fractal Journey
generated_games.learning_objective: Recognize iterative stages of the Koch snowflake and apply fractal rules
